price: Dõmin Ya sãkã wa waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai. Waɗancan suna da wata gãfara da wani arziki mai karimci.
arabic: لِّيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
